text: Ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God kamaghɨn na mɨkeme, “Jeremaia, nɨ akar kam gumazamizir kabav kemegh. Kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Gavgaviba Bar Itim, Israelian God, kɨ kamaghɨn mɨgei, ‘Kɨ apaniba amadaghtɨ, me izɨ ia mɨsogh ia gasɨghasɨgham, eghtɨ ia wainɨn dɨpar kam amɨ mangɨvɨra ikɨ wainɨn dɨpar bar avɨribar amɨva, ia bar onganigh, mighɨva nguazim giregh ua dɨkavan kogham.’
